## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G16820](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G16820)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHSF3, ATHSFA1B, HSF3, HSFA1B</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS HEAT SHOCK FACTOR 3, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA CLASS A HEAT SHOCK FACTOR 1B, heat shock factor 3, CLASS A HEAT SHOCK FACTOR 1B
- **Description:**   heat shock factor 3;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Plant Ontology Annotations:

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [hsf1/3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced HSP production but no change in thermotolerance.
